Locale.String: Always elevate user permissions when running in Windows Vista

Locale.String: Select a standard hotkey or choose 'Custom' and hold Ctrl,Shift and/or Alt and type your desired hotkey for language %0:s:

String.Description: Hotkey dialog - message displayed when changing a hotkey for a product feature (e.g. show menu or show on screen keyboard)

Locale.String: Select a standard hotkey or choose 'Custom' and hold Ctrl,Shift and/or Alt and type your desired hotkey:

String.Description: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use

Locale.String: The hotkey %0:s will conflict with normal keyboard use. You should use at least Ctrl or Alt. Do you want to change this now?

String.Description: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another keyboard

Locale.String: The hotkey %0:s conflicts with the hotkey selected for keyboard %1:s. If you continue, the hotkey for keyboard %1:s will be cleared. Continue?

String.Description: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another interface hotkey

Locale.String: The hotkey %0:s conflicts with another hotkey. If you continue, the other hotkey will be cleared. Continue?

Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

Locale.String: A package with the name %0:s is already installed. Do you want to uninstall it and install the new one?

String.Description: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

Locale.String: A keyboard with the name '%0:s' is already installed. If you continue, it will be uninstalled before the new one is installed. Continue?

String.Description: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

Locale.String: The keyboard '%0:s' is part of package '%1:s'. You must uninstall the entire package. Continue?

String.Description: Notice of lack of introductory help

Locale.String: The package or keyboard '%0:s' does not include any introductory help.

String.Description: Notice of unsupported operating system

Locale.String: This operating system is not supported.

String.Description: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file
Notice of help file not found

Locale.String: The help file could not be found.

Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout

Locale.String: Are you sure you want to remove the on screen keyboard installed for %0:s?

String.Description: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout

Locale.String: Are you sure you want to uninstall keyboard %0:s?

Locale.String:
Are you sure you want to uninstall package %0:s?

String.Description: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

Locale.String: The following fonts will also be uninstalled: %0:s.

String.Description: Request to build Unicode Character Map database

Locale.String: The Character Map has a database of characters that needs to be built before it can be used. Build it now?

String.Description: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

Locale.String: The Unicode Character database could not be deleted for a rebuild. Error details are: %0:s

String.Description: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

Locale.String: The Unicode Character database could not be created and has been disabled. Error details are: %0:s

String.Description: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

Locale.String: The Unicode character database did not load successfully (%0:s). Rebuild it now?

String.Description: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

Locale.String:
&Name; failed to start. Please check your security settings to make sure that the program keyman.exe is allowed to start before continuing. The error returned was:
"%0:s"
Do you want to try and start &Name; again now?

String.Description: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

Locale.String:
&Name; debug information will be stored in a log file called %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (where # is a number). You should exit &Name; before attempting to delete this file.
WARNING: This file can grow large very quickly. Enabling debugging may slow down your system and should only be done if advised by technical support.
PRIVACY WARNING: Please note that the debug logfile records all keystrokes that you type. You should only turn on the debug log for the duration of a debugging or diagnostic session.

String.Description: OSK Font helper message

Locale.String: Please wait while searching for releted fonts for keyboard %0:s

String.Description: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard

Locale.String: Keyboard %0:s is not a Unicode keyboard. Fonts cannot be automatically located. Please check the keyboard documentation for font information.

String.Description: OSK Font helper no keyboards

Locale.String: No keyboard layouts are currently installed or loaded.

String.Description: OSK Font helper choose keyboard

Locale.String: Please select a &Name; keyboard to find related fonts.

String.Description: Caption of Text Editor
